about_the_game:
Embark on an epic adventure back to 1775, where intrepid explorers set sail for a world brimming with new beginnings and untold riches. However, a tempest of unprecedented might thrusts them onto an island lost in time. Begin your journey with nothing but determination as you guide a resilient band of survivors through uncharted territory. Explore the mysterious island, gather vital resources, and construct a new home against the backdrop of looming prehistoric threats. Brace yourself for the ultimate test – survival is not just a goal; it's the heart-pounding essence of the game.

FORM A NEW SOCIETY

Lead your colonists and make impactful choices to form a society with new laws and politics, which will have a lasting impact on your village as you work to survive. Will you try to hold to the ways of your homeland to maintain a sense of civilization, or will you devolve to your primitive ancestry and brutal ways of life. Keeping the morale of your villagers high as they fill their days with hard labor and exposure to fierce dinosaurs is critical. Listen to requests from your people, punish those who get out of line, and choose how your precious resources are used.

SURVIVAL IS KEY

Survival is the only option in this land beyond time, where prehistoric Dinosaurs, giant insects and other dangerous animals thought long extinct roam free. Navigate an unforgiving environment, where dynamic seasons unleash floods, alter dinosaur migrations, and induce droughts, creating a relentless test of your survival instincts. Encounter dangerous plant life that can kill, but also provide sustenance and the potential to craft life-saving medicine. Brace for the unpredictable eruption of volcanoes, unleashing fires that spread with wild abandon. As you master the art of village construction, command your colonists to not only endure but flourish in the face of these formidable challenges.

LIVING WITH DINOSAURS

Dinosaurs are as destructive as they are helpful. Tame the very thing that threatens your survival. Discover countless types of Dinosaurs, Giant Insects and Animals and learn how they behave. Capture, tame and breed wildlife to domesticate them and improve your chances of survival. Farm this new land on the backs of these mighty beasts. Use them to pull carts and plows, or mounts to explore the island, or to fill the bellies of your villagers.



Shipwrecked: Lost Colony explores the idea of man living with dinosaurs in the 18th century. Take charge of your budding village in a mysterious new land and grow to survive.

name: Shipwrecked: Lost Colony

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 @ 3.3 GHz | AMD FX 8320 @ 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4-6GB of VRAM, GTX 1060 or RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible using the latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Target Performance: >30FPS @ 1080p using medium graphical settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 @ 3.0 GHz | AMD Ryzen 5 2600X @ 3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6-8 GB of VRAM RTX 2060, RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible using the latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Target Performance: 60FPS @ 1080p using high graphical settings

short_description: Shipwrecked: Lost Colony is an 18th Century city-survival builder set on a tropical isle lost to time. Lead a group of marooned survivors and forge a new beginning in an uncharted land, where dinosaurs are the biggest threat and your strongest allies.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
